#summary What's new in each version
#labels Featured

= Alpha Builds =

==r72==

  * Support for deserializing known sub-object fields encoded using groups (instead of length-prefixed); data is serialized as length-prefixed; not supported for extension fields
  * Support for [Extensions extension] fields
  * Recursion detection when serializing


==r53==

  * Optimised field lookup during deserialization
  * Wcf example
  * Silverlight example
  * Support for enums
  * Compatibility tweaks (C# 2 / mono / .NET 2.0 / VS2005 / Sliverlight)
